name: Peter's Song
description:
My Website

Made for the 2014 indie game maker contest

Music is the true soul of a game. It conveys feelings and informations towards the player about his environment, his situation or the storyline. But what if you were now the one who controls the music?

Peter's Song is an atypical exploration (and non-horror) game with a strong emotional background where you progress through your journey by manipulating the sounds and the musics of the rooms you're in to change their ambiance and solve puzzles. You embody the inspector Philihert Remnant, a forty years old man with a quite bad reputation in the police station who's trying to catch the serial killer known under the name of "Peter Bang". In this purpose, you'll have to explore a strange mansion where he's hiding, but it's a deeper story you'll find in it...

Game made by Romain -ChronoDream- Tresarrieu and Adrien Poncet.
